definition: (of a state or an event) taking place without something specified occurring at the same time, without anybody else or anything else
details:
adjective
- (of a state or an event) taking place without something specified occurring at the same time
= example: (of a state or an event) taking place without something specified occurring at the same time
- being without an escort
- playing or singing without accompaniment
= example: playing or singing without accompaniment
adverb
- without anybody else or anything else
= synonyms: solo
